twitch_info.title: I wanna kill the kamilia 3 - Secret 5 - Attempts - PB: Screen 9 of 9 - Still going (vid 7)

message.body: I think you can see why this is still going. XD
you haven't even seen it get bad yet. XD
failblogging at easy shit suddenly for no reason so ye
and now is the bad part
left to right, right to left, then left to middle
And THIS is why I'm still here
I've had 5 attempts at the ending aka screen 9
the ending being the final left to middle
and I'm almost at 50 hours grind IGT (in-game time).
that equates to a screen 9 attempt per 10 hours. In reality, I tend to get screen 9 attempts per 4 hours right now.
That said, I didn't get one yesterday
and I haven't had one today either
I've now brought you up to speed in a nut shell
oh right, and it's been like 5 or so streams
That hard part I showed you, left to right is screen 7. Right to left is screen 8. Left to middle is screen 9.
In terms of time taken SMGPlayer is the highest I found on YouTube, at 69 hours and clearingo n his 6th screen 9 attempt.
If I don't clear on this next screen 9 attempt, then I have surpassed what I presume to be the record of screen 9 attempts before clearing.
current IGT is 253:29:33, I started this at around 204:something:something
and now you're fully up to date :D
So, welcome to hell - aka Secret 5. That I've spent a week and a day on, and it looks like it'll be much more.
in 27 minutes we'll be at 50 hours.
Although if you notice the math, it'll be another 18 on top of that in reality
and it's the drops into the 16 px diagonals that's the hardest part
and the reasons I die most of the time.
Aaaand there you have it, everything explained.
oh right except for the fact I actually quit and go back into secret 5 with a reset on the same frame to restart the secret music for the eventual clear video.
That's all I have to explain.
I could go into detail about individual jumps since they're precise but yeah.
buthonestly my frame counter on the top right says it all
obviously many of these jumps have specific strategies you can't really tell without looking at what I'm doing
and that's secret 5 in a nutshell, complete with occasional stutter jump if you do bad setup, silly 16px gaps, stupidly precise double jump wrap arounds
timings and raw skill are essential
Last but not least, this is the most infamous secret in K3, and probably the most infamous part of K3.
Certainly the hardest platforming in K3 generally speaking, at least that's what I've heard.
And for some people, the literal hardest part of the game, like for Razzor who completed everything else in K3 but this was hell.
Razzor cleared on his 2nd screen 9 attempt at 60 hours grind time, getting his first screen 9 in 40 hours.
For me, I got my first screen 9 in 15 hours, then 29 hours nearly 30 hours, and then I think I got one around 34 and 38 respectively.
and then 44-48 somewhere in that range for the next one after
well 40-48, I don't know the range lmao
I can probably take it down a couple hours from today so
Mastermaxify cleared on his 5th screen 9 attempt.
So I've already gone past his screen 9 attempts.
only example I have to go by now is SMGPlayer.
So, that's it Nord. I welcome you to the G R I N D. xD
Achievement Get: Explain to Nord before he goes to bed.
I didn't tell him how I projected 60+ hours to start with, and how others were thinking 25-30+
and here I am pretty much reaching 60+
He,ll sleep better not knowing for now lol
so he knows why it's a big deal lul
So Kinker, think I'll get ONE screen 9 attempt today?
Is that a no disguised as a maybe? :P
Pretty late though so im not gunna get all my hope up xD
There's no point giving any energy to this game
All it does is pour it into a sink hole.
Meant to be up 4 hours ago to REEE at you :D
I have been taking the grind much less seriously now.
Because who the fuck keeps serious for 50 hours
we'll be reaching 50 hours in this stream
Heres hoping you get er done before the 8th xD
??? I'd need to be grinding for like
which secret 5 will NOT take THAT long
Nah 3 years and 3 weeks ill be 30 and old by then xD
well get a grip holy shit
Heres hoping ur in the same mind set when u hit 30 xD
and not until 80 are you actually old
I mean I'm 22 so, I might you know.
I was 22 once good times lol
Couldnt do this madlad stuff though
when you were my age I doubt this game even existed
And if it did, not in its completed state its in now.
Well I woulda bin an anxty teen xD
Besides, timemachine 2- the game that got me into IWBTG fangames, didn't even exist until 2015.
which the original be the guy was released in 2007
2011 is when the source code of the original guy was released
and the official remaster came in 2020.
Ya I couldnt run em was too into console
besides real iwbtg fangames imo didn't come into existence until 2015
yeah there are some really good oldies from before 2015
I was still learning xp then I think xD
That's right, 2007 was the xp days
but you were still learning xp in 2015? lul
I think 2015 was the win7-8.1 days
We didnt have the best stuff in school
Oh huh, win7 came in, in 2009
They spent there budget on smartboards
so 2007 may actually be the vista days
2006 was vista release to manufacturers, but general availability game in 2007.
I think "Some" pc,s had it mine was my own computer though xD
So the original guy came out when vista was the current version of windows
most people used XP primarily though.
Pretty sure they made the transition to vista over 7 making some people fail xD
I just remember half the class using xp and vista and a lucky few with 7 at sum point
it existed but it was like not used
All the main school pcs were either xp or 7
for me vista was rare actually
I remember the free upgrade nobody wanted xD
I remember that free upgrade in 2015
I was on a lousy broken-ass win8.1 machine
So I wasn't going to upgrade and kill it early
Great editing software the hardware sucked though
plus the free upgrade system was legitimately broken
If you upgraded with it, you would have your gpu set to overclock
You either used the media creation tool to boot from a live usb or disk with a windows 10 installation and format the hard drive with it.
or got a pc with win10 preinstalled
Any other method means you're going to fail
I just remember being the madlad with a 600gb hd that could boot xp 2000 and 95 xD
win10 was heavily avoided and most who upgraded ended up getting new machines.
I got xp and 2000 to multiboot then a friend showed me how to do a 3rd
Fast forward to today and everyone has win10 machines
don't get me started with the built-in entropic decay of windows
That gets reset every time you get a new feature update.
The background update kill it for me a bit
and restarts your machine for you
and does it when you specifically don't want to
They have a setting called active hours
if you set that then it won't restart automatically in that time
But I think it's really dumb they don't even tell you about this.
Like maybe my work is dependent on that ver of windows thank microsoft
Even then they cap it to 18 hours or smth
Soon they wont have a setting option it'll all be proprietary
Yeah and only the Professional or Enterprise editions will allow you to change it
They already lock the group policy settings behind professional and/or enterprise.
In-fact they get the most update customisation
Cause we,re too dumb to Own a computer like actually own what we bought xD
That's definitely what they think, yeah.
They try to shove down inking data and all sorts of crap down your throat
And you have to be very careful what settings you press or turn off in the veritable landmine.
The state of console atm lmao
consoles are worse in that you can't even edit the os if you need to
Least linux doesnt call me dumb everyday with a smile xD
but linux also requires you to be hackermans
I'm joking but it feels like it
Linux suffers from having like EVERY SETTING IN THE WORLD customiseable to you.
Linux isn't for the feint hearted anyway.
It's because Linux is such a massive curve ball that requires you to be willing to do a lot of research and forum reading.
For me it's just cause my games don't work outside of it and I can't be arsed to have a full virtualisation setup with graphics card passthroughs.
Got spammed n it reset chat
sent it to you in DS lmao
If I get enough money to buy a genuine beast of a machine
Then I'll do the full virtualisation route.
Not sure if I want to split the windows and linux partitions in an SSD or have two separate SSDs if I got that route though.
My thought exactly still gatta finish the vm I got and even then its more for storing/scrubbing files
I guess linux runs just fine on a HDD. The biggest problem with win10 is it needs SSD to function well.
my current VM is just for server stuff
Same issue here got it on an HDD
most manufacturers haven't caught onto the fact that putting win10 on a HDD is a BAD IDEA.
plus it's cheaper for us as the consumer so
they just shove it in and don't give a fuck
Gatta reset chat again forgot to appear offline
wb and DMs for the chat history
Anyway, I think I'll go for custom built at a place, rather than doing it myself when the time comes.
I don't mind the extra fee to not have ALL THAT HASTLE
Just wait till they find out how to make cheap SSD,s
then we won't even have HDDs anymore
and we'll be scraping at the market trying to get HDDs because they're still useful
HDDs and SSDs all have extremely viable use cases
And you don't want to be using one or the other universally
HDDs for mass storage is much better than SSD by a large margain
As a physical disk won't just give out without warning but an SSD will.
One is good for storing the other is good at using those files
and this is a design sort of deal
getting better tech will not change this
And yea one also lasts longer n cant fall great hights
Even when we get amazing tech, those old disk platter HDDs are still better for long-term storage.
is a hybrid system (not like the fucked ones that currently exist)
One for SSD and one for HDD
I hold my breath not even kidding
Every time I die just before screen 8? lmao
Yeah, I used to as well
Aww all the fun is gone xD
all the fun was gone 30 hours ago
Just noticed the screen counter oml
well okay more l ike 15-20 hours ago
and wow took you a while xD
and have been for a while
We're roughly 10 hours away from 60 hours lmao.
And part of me is aiming for 70 hours and 2 more screen 9 attempts

The great slow-mo teleporting Eradem xD
But it wasn't actually me per se
it was the twitch servers I'm connected to
Could be shitty canadian telus just sucking
probabl ynot given I dropped frames xd
If only you could hear me jammin to K3 music xD
Oh yeah, the secret music in K3 is amazing.
Not only that, but the secret music in K3 fits secrets 2 & 5 perfectly
It does NOT work with secret 3 though imo
Secrets 1 & 4 it works well enough in, not perfect though.
Im havin a pretty good time with it

Fell asleep to it and woke up to it as well
If anything, hearing this music always reminds me of secret 5.
and that was even before I played secret 5
So it's clearly perfect for secret 5
I could be still asleep doing the same thing I was when passed out xD
It's a good thing the music is good enough to be okay even through many hours of grinding
Which is another reason why it's perfect for secret 5.

casually eating pesto chicken over here

in that case you spelt it perfectly

Hey era did you know your still on secret 5 lmfao
As you and I both know, it's foolish to expect progress in Secret 5.
Soon here I may do some timemachine 2 any% runs just for fun instead
This is just to show would be gamers it cant be done xD
I intend to highlight all of these streams
and point people to it if they say they can clear secret 5
Realtalk, I'll only point people to the streams in order to just show them how hard it is, so they know full on how bad it's going to be.
I'm just imagining someone watching all of my secret 5 streams up until now.
Was it really worth the time?
Ill just watch and be there to tell people that Do itll be ok xD
The fantastic players can do this in like 9 hours
But those are players who presumably have a decade of experience
With that in mind, the fact I even reached secret 5 let alone screen 9, is insane.
If this is only 3 years worth of skill
Then what the hell am I actually capable of.
Most with decades of skill could probly look back to year 3 with less under there belt
I feel like I don't actually have a limit. It'll just keep going
I,d just imagine its final life before game over that when all the tricks come out of the bag
That reminds me egg and Kinker.
There are times in 2hu where I just flawless the final boss in a run regardless of difficulty
In my th10 lunatic no-bomb run I flawlessed the entire final stage
And in my BoSM Hard no-bomb 1cc, I flawlessed the final boss out of nowhere
I always died 3-4 times in practice.
yeah thats a thing I've noticed
while practising the first jump of a save, it always seems harder than when its a choke jump
Sometimes that extra 1% gets put into play without even meaning too xD
A while ago I did perfect first 4 stages of th6 lunatic
and I still don't know where that 4th stage perfect came from
Also it's weird, I had a run where I had 1 life on stage 6 and I reached the final spell of Remilia
the best person I've seen play live would probably be ninz
they were doing levels of NANC2 deathless
I didn't watch the streams but I saw it.
Only thing I got is I can still do impossible game all lvls eyes close but thats 2 years of time wasted xD
bear in mind ninz cleared brute and also did discord makers speed run.
So it's not out of the question at all
sadly my problem with secret 5 is in real attempts, not jtool
In jtool it's llike, oh you want to do 7-9? Sure man.
jtool has different physics from what I can tell im not sure tho
K3 has an extra frame for calculations
yeah but it still makes a big difference in these extremely tight jumps
It means setting up a jump cancel is actually quite hard to do with numpad, unless you pre-plan it.
in jtool jump cancels are easy
I had to actually look up Redire's video to help me out with the starter crystal
It turns out if you set up the jump cancel while in mid-air you gain an the missing frame window for cancelling in the dplane.
one thing I really don't like about needles is aligns
from there it became super easy
I do like the idea of aligns
But the execution is often just out there
the first time I attempted k3 I got stuck on the NCE screen because I couldn't do that one corner
then after beating NANG I found out it was because you needed an align
and then found out an align made it possible, right?
K3 is like that though. The thing about K3 is it expects you to already know all of this stuff.
There is no hand holding with this game.
im still stuck on the first boss of k3 lmao
bosses are usually so difficult compared to the normal levels in fangames
lmao I did one better. I got stuck on secret 1 entrance for over a year.
So I don't blame you for just not doing it.
also shine and bright is pretty bad too
and the guy is bad too honestly because of benzen
one of the parts I hate the most is those lights that come out of flandre at the start
it makes a bunch of attacks seem so rng
Stage 3 boss (The Guy) was ALMOST good, 1st phase was stellar, but then everything past that was horrible.
K3 has a really big problem
Every single boss is filled to the brim with the most garbage RNG you can imagine.
My first genuine good boss was colonel in boss rush
The RNG was still garbage, but the fight was fun
My only hope of seeing em is watching Era xD
oh and stage 4 boss, it has a stupid learning curve
The start of stage 4 boss is SO BAD to learn.
But once you get past that learning phase, stage 4 boss becomes really good.
took me about 11 hours to do stage 4 boss
Honestly fantastic boss, but the learning is terrible.
flandre, shine and bright, the guy, and then I dont remember stage 4
so stage 4 in general is boss rush?
Stage 4's pretty long before boss rush.
It felt like the longest stage in the game for me.
It also includes the bubble screen.
the attack of influka I fear the most is when the backround goes white and theres a bunch of black cherries
and your teleported to the tio
Took me a while to recognise it
theres so many words that fit
Secret 5's the worst part of this game I've played lmao.
I'm about 51 hours into the grind, so I can't even take it very seriously anymore either.
and screen 6's latter part is kinda tough due to the drop into 16 px
Then you have screens 7-9 which are fun in jtool, but in-game it's really just not great.
If they took out screen 6, I'd see it as partially reasonable to have 7-9.
But having 6 as well makes it all the more worse imo.
but let me tell you this.. even watching is as bad as playing secret 5 ^^
When I finally clear it, I intend to highlight the streams, so anyone who wants to play secret 5 know full well how bad it really is before they try it.
even tho i enjoy k3 any% speedruns
For me? Definitely. I'm playing K3 to raise my skill in the first place.
But.... I wouldn't advise it to like, anyone.

Besides, there aren't many people who have completed K3. And honestly this secret is a prime example of why.

so you're saying that you stuck on this for more than 2days?
I've been on secret 5 for a week and a day.

All of the achievements leading up to here
tempest crystal and guy tower was fun hm?

except the 4 hidden bosses, I'm doing those right after I finish secret 5.
one in each stage tucked away

I'm getting secret 5 for two reasons
One, it's right here so get it out of the way and I need it for 100%
Two, it means I don't have to replay the whole of garbage stage 3

so he's the last one I gotta do

apparently crimson is easier than normal, just long.
while crimson seems to be the easiest of them
crimson seems to be the easiest, nue the worst
yeah guess the order is right the difficulty of them
and tempest crystal took me 29 hours, guy tower 41 hours.
what do the crystals even do-
Tempest was okay to be honest, just really annoying cause I failed at the ending constantly, much like how I have in secret 5, only I got to the ending more consistently.
who knew that the 41 hour guy tower could be broken
guy tower crystal was honestly mostly a fun grind
The only problem with it was the jump refresher save
and HOOO BOY was that a problem
well, tje ome jump was just bad
yes this is what i mean
That segment was the hardest part of gtc
Everything else was free by comparison
during ninz's NANC2 stages deathless stream the discussion started being about the final level deathless and im just like
this jump just felt so lucky
"If I had money, I would PAY to see the final level deathess"
I think I spent like 22 or so hours getting consistent enough.
So yeah, most of my grind was just that save
and heh nanc2 final level deathless would be INSANE
and then there's the final boss which is just yeah
in short, the final level of NANC2 is well
its 3x the length of a normal level
and way harder than most other levels

comparing phase 2 to phase 1 and 3 is like comparing iwbtg to mario bros

it was such a god-damn relief once I finally got past phase 2

But yeah, Max enjoyed the boss, but people's positions on the boss seem to vary.
Some people just don't like it

dang, platform phase is actually free too

oh thank god you didn't need them

I've also done a speedrun on Gaze at the Horizon because I may be slightly insane.
oh yeah just wondering what does bhop actually do
I'm planning on playing NANC2 soon enough
I understand how to do it
but I dont understand what you do it for
makes you be able to jump higher
to reach 4.5 blocks or other stuff
Gives you that extra pixel or smth
Bhop is actually used for almost everything
canceling makes you jump very low
used for Mini fs, inverts and such
To be very specific, cancelling works because release jump affects velocity.
So you're chaining release jumps in a row, basically
making you do some precise stuff
cancelling is honestly a cool mechanic
not a fan of shift cancellig requiring specific keyboards though.
I'm glad we have the universal numpad.
numpad cancel saves my life dude
Cherry red keyboards basically can't shift cancel
So I have to numpad lmao
i have a Blue switch keyboard
so it's kinda easy to shift cancel
fun-fact, the best keyboards for shift cancelling are really cheap membrane keyboards, according to ninz
Membranes are really cool for shift canceling
Blue switches are good for shift cancel, but inconsistent
I'm thinking of buying one to do the two keyboard setup that ninz does.
I use a 2 keyboard setup for multiple games dude LUL
2 frame jumps need good keyboards too
and if your keyboard can't 2f well you're screwed for ttm2 lunatic
I have 2 blue switches keyboard, one membrane
but i use the 2 blue switches everyday for gaming
So yeah, you kinda need a good keyboard for 2f and a good keyboard for shift cancelling.
I have a laptop too lmao
they're good for just bringing anywhere tbh
i mean, i can 1f with a blue switch, so you can do it aswell with a blue switch

C&C with friends thats it xD

Blue switches are kinda random for that

I would need one of those zero G setups for all that xD

Now if you were using 10 keyboards at once I'd be kinda shocked.
Mainly because I have no idea how you'd even do that.
I don't think i would be that crazy man
i'm already using 2 keyboards for talking and playing games, no need to add more, i'm good right now

ah nah I won't intentionally ruin an attempt lmao
i already throw intentionally extremely good Spelunky 2 runs late game

well at least that means you should be close to getting a successful screen 9 attempt

yes because of how much he did screen 8 and 9, no because of pressure

shaky hands doesn't help at all in precise needle
as I said before, it feels like you die less on a jump when its used as a choke jump rather than the first jump

what if there's some actual lore behinf common iwbtg things
like where did these save points come from

but its still interesting to think about
tho ye you are right egg
lore can come up without the creator originally thinking about it
S5 you never know, like ever.
You never even know if you'll get a screen 8 attempt.
S55 is the most BS rng shit
That's why S5 drives people insane.
He means your inputs from your hands
because of pressure, number of times you tried, time you spend and other stuff
that is what most needle is tbh
The more you spend, the less able you are
S5 is a whole other kettle of fish
